content: internal IBM events and participates in international projects. He is the co-author of several IBM Redbooks publications. Hervey Kamga is an IBM Z Product Engineer with the EMEA I/O Connectivity Team in Montpellier, France. Before serving in his current role, he was a Support Engineer and Engineer On Site for 13 years with Sun MicroSystems and Oracle in EMEA. Hervey’s areas of expertise include Oracle Solaris (operating system and hardware products), virtualization (VMware and virtualBox), Linux, and IBM Z I/O features and protocols (IBM FICON® and OSA) while co-authoring several IBM Redbooks publications. Preface xvii Bo Xu is a consulting product Service SSR in China. He has more than 20 years of experience with IBM Z platform maintenance support. He has been working in IBM’s Global Technology Services department to provide IBM Z platform support to clients as a local Top Gun, and as second-level support for IBM DS8000® as one of the country’s Top Gun & Skill Owners.
